title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.5 - Denial of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.5 - Denial of application

State Regulations

In the event that an application for an operating
certificate is denied, the applicant shall be notified in writing of the denial
and of the reasons for such denial. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
477.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
